content: Provide a list of 20 words ending with 'ion'.

Sure, here's a list of 20 words that end with "ion":

1. Information
2. Education
3. Creation
4. Nation
5. Population
6. Station
7. Situation
8. Operation
9. Communication
10. Invitation
11. Action
12. Condition
13. Connection
14. Production
15. Observation
16. Decision
17. Position
18. Solution
19. Transition
20. Imagination

I hope this helps!
